Package boundary

Class RegistrationMain

Object
RegistrationMain
All Implemented Interfaces:
IRegistrationMain
public class RegistrationMain extends Object implements IRegistrationMain
Boundary class for Managers to manager registrations This class handles the user interface for registration management

    • processRegistrations

      public void processRegistrations(Manager manager, Scanner sc, boolean isApproval)
      Allow manager to process pending registrations by approving or rejecting them
      Parameters:
      manager - Manager processing the registrations
      sc - Scanner object for user input
      isApproval - true to approve registration, false to reject registration
